description: This file contains asynchronous job management functions and Celery tasks for executing various network management operations such as SNMP, WebPA, TR-069, and USP. It defines functions for updating job status, checking for cancellation, and performs specific operations like get/set/bulk walk for SNMP, get/set for WebPA, TR-069, and USP protocols. The code integrates with a database session, external protocol clients, and uses Celery for task management.

methods.name: None _update_job_status( session: AsyncSession, job_id: str, status: str, details: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, progress: Optional[int] = None, )
methods.description: Updates the status and optional result data of a specific job in the database, also updating progress and handling concurrency with commit.

methods.name: bool _check_cancellation(session: AsyncSession, job_id: str)
methods.description: Checks whether a specific job has been marked as canceled, returning True if canceled.

methods.name: str snmp_bulkwalk(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, device_ip: str, oid: str, cred: Dict[str, Any], max_rows: int = 100)
str snmp_get(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, device_ip: str, oid: str, cred: Dict[str, Any])
str snmp_set(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, device_ip: str, oid: str, value: Any, value_type: str, cred: Dict[str, Any])
str tr069_get(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], device_id: str, parameters: list)
str tr069_set(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], device_id: str, parameters: Dict[str, Any])
str usp_get(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], device_id: str, path: str)
str usp_set(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], device_id: str, path: str, value: Any)
str webpa_get(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], path: str)
str webpa_set(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], path: str, value: Any, data_type: int = 0)

ctags.name: _update_job_status
ctags.signature: ( session: AsyncSession, job_id: str, status: str, details: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, progress: Optional[int] = None, )

ctags.name: snmp_bulkwalk
ctags.pattern: /^def snmp_bulkwalk(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, device_ip: str, oid: str, cred: Dict[str, Any], ma/
ctags.signature: (self: RLSTask, job_id: str, device_ip: str, oid: str, cred: Dict[str, Any], max_rows: int = 100)
